statements: DELETE FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE id = 1 AND congestion_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE traffic_flow > 100 AND location = 'Highway 101';
DELETE FROM map_settings WHERE show_traffic = false;
DELETE FROM map_settings WHERE map_type = 'satellite' AND show_traffic = true;
DELETE FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE congestion_level > 5 AND traffic_level < 3;
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE location_id = 3 AND sensor_type = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE location_id = 5 AND sensor_type = 'temperature';
